title: React Developer Tools
subject: React
theory:
## Debugging Superpowers
React DevTools is a browser extension for Chrome/Firefox.

### Features
1. **Components Tab**: Inspect the component tree, see props, state, and hooks in real-time. Edit them to test UI.
2. **Profiler**: Record performance to see which components re-render and how long they take.

### Usage
Open Browser Inspect -> Look for 'Components' and 'Profiler' tabs.

real_world_use_cases.description: Why didn't my component update? Check DevTools to see if state actually changed.

summary: You cannot effectively develop React without the DevTools.
